short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that summarizes selected text using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use the "Syneos Health AI Genius (VPN Required)" Chrome extension for text summarization, follow these simple steps:

1. Select the text: Highlight the content you want to summarize in the Chrome browser window.

2. Right-click and choose the extension: Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu. Look for the option "Syneos Health AI Genius (VPN Required)" in the menu.

3. Open the summarization window: Click on "Syneos Health AI Genius (VPN Required)" to open a new window. Your selected text will be automatically copied into the "Selected Text:" field.

4. Click the "Summarize" button: Once the window is open, click on the "Summarize" button. The AI-powered algorithm will process the selected text and provide you with a summary.

Ensure Chrome browser usage: Please note that this extension works specifically with text selected within the Chrome browser. Make sure your documents or web content are opened in Chrome for optimal functionality.

By following these steps, you can leverage the power of AI to quickly and efficiently summarize content using the "Syneos Health AI Genius (VPN Required)" Chrome extension.
